newsItems.title: Summer Giveaway Started
newsItems.description: Hello everyone! Thank you for continuously using our Melon Mods application. We truly appreciate each one of you and are thrilled to launch our first Giveaway contest.

paragraphs.subTitle: How to Enter
paragraphs.content: For a chance to win a yearly or monthly subscription, follow the instructions below.

paragraphs.subTitle: Step 1
paragraphs.content: Ensure you are using the latest version of our app.

paragraphs.subTitle: Step 2
paragraphs.content: Turn on notifications in the app settings to stay updated.

paragraphs.subTitle: Step 3
paragraphs.content: If you enjoy our community, please share your feedback on the App Store. Let us know what you like, what you don't, and any new features or modifications you'd like to see in future updates. Don't forget to include your nickname!

paragraphs.subTitle: Draw Date
paragraphs.content: The giveaway will run from July 20th to August 20th.

paragraphs.subTitle: Winner Announcement
paragraphs.content: Winners will be announced in the app on August 23rd.

newsItems.title: Contest Ended
newsItems.description: Thank you to everyone who participated in our Summer Giveaway contest! The contest has officially ended, and we're excited to review all the entries. Stay tuned as we'll be announcing the winners in just 3 days!

paragraphs.content: We'll be selecting the lucky winners and sharing the results here. Make sure to check back on August 24rd to see if you've won. Good luck to all participants!
